info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 5 at 1:19AM CDT until April 5 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
FFWPAH
The National Weather Service in Paducah has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Carter County in southeastern Missouri...
* Until 630 AM CDT.
* At 119 AM CDT, emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain. 15 water rescues have already occurred in the city of Van Buren. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Van Buren. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Van Buren, Ellsinore, Hunter, Fremont and Grandin.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR VAN BUREN
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 6:30 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 6:30 AM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR VAN BUREN
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:30 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:30 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
